personal.name: Piyush
personal.title: AI Innovator & Data Science Learner
personal.tagline: Building the Future with AI, Data, and Purpose
personal.bio: An 18-year-old AI & Data Science learner exploring how intelligence, design, and empathy can shape a better future.

story.spark: My journey into AI began with a simple curiosity — how can machines think, learn, and understand like humans? Watching how AI could write, create, and solve problems made me realize intelligence isn't just something we use, it's something we can build.
story.journey: I began teaching myself the foundations — Python, data structures, and the logic behind machine learning. Step by step, I explored AI, Data Science, and Automation through online resources, real-world experiments, and community learning.
story.purpose: I believe AI is not just technology — it's a reflection of how humans think, decide, and dream. My purpose is to create ethical, human-centered AI systems that enhance creativity, productivity, and opportunity.
story.vision: My long-term vision is to build AI startups that combine technical innovation with social impact — creating intelligent products that empower learners, creators, and organizations.
